attributes.action: Have ALL dogs on lead in public, with a muzzle
attributes.additional_details: For the safety of public and children. I want to be able to go for a walk in the park without being afraid of getting bitten by a dog. And alot of them show aggressive tendencies. And their owners always downplay how aggressive their dog is or in denial. Please can we have them on a lead at least.
attributes.background: Consider all dogs In public to be put on a lead. Most dogs I have encountered come very close and start barking up next to me and one even tried to attack a child in the park in front of me. Owners always say the dog is nice. People have anxiety going for walks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all dogs to be kept on leads in public places
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750056
